WW_Relics:Strike_Weakest.NAME: Weakest Strike
WW_Relics:Strike_Weakest.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhausts. NL Ethereal.

WW_Relics:Defend_Weakest.NAME: Weakest Block
WW_Relics:Defend_Weakest.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhausts. NL Ethereal.

WW_Relics:WeakestEnergyBlast.NAME: Weakest Energy Blast
WW_Relics:WeakestEnergyBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 1/3 Potential. NL Exhausts. NL Ethereal.

WW_Relics:WeakestFlyingKick.NAME: Weakest Flying Kick
WW_Relics:WeakestFlyingKick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhausts. NL Ethereal.

WW_Relics:WeakestTaunt.NAME: Weakest Taunt
WW_Relics:WeakestTaunt.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Weak. NL Gain 1/3 Potential. NL Exhausts. NL Ethereal.

WW_Relics:WeakestProvocation.NAME: Weakest Provocation
WW_Relics:WeakestProvocation.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Vulnerable. NL Gain 1/3 Potential. NL Exhausts. NL Ethereal.
